thread.title: Andrew Read to Join Board of Directors of International Endeavors Corporation

author: cnbc.com
title: Andrew Read to Join Board of Directors of International Endeavors Corporation

organizations.name: join board of directors of international endeavors corporation

text:
TEMECULA, Calif., March 05, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- via OTC PR WIRE--- International Endeavors Corporation, a Medical Marijuana IP Holdings Company today announced that Andrew Read has agreed to join the company’s Board of directors. Read most recently served as president of Voltage River, a boutique energy services company providing energy management solutions to businesses and home owners in California.
“Andrew brings with him the expertise we need to move into the energy segment of the Medical Marijuana industry and is passionate about clean energy. His expertise in the solar industry will be extremely valuable to customers as we prepare to enter the energy segment of the MMJ industry. We are excited to welcome him to the board.” stated Nathan Engal, President of International Endeavors Corporation.
Andrew has been involved in the clean energy industry since 2003 and founded Voltage River in 2011. Andrew has designed and built hundreds of solar electric and battery systems for commercial and residential use, the core focus has been to reduce electricity costs by leveraging the benefits of solar electric and advanced energy storage systems. Andrew brings considerable knowledge focusing on applying his skills to help growers develop a means of cutting energy costs and expand opportunities for off the grid growing facilities for the cannabis industry.
About International Endeavors Corporation
International Endeavors Corporation is a company focused on building IP in the Medical Marijuana Sector through the creation of biomedical devices, clean energy and patents. www.internationalendeavorscorp.com
